sinhala pasale ki‡∑ärada pittaniye degollo ma hari hariyata ki‡∑ärada kala.menisa ma mowun athara dadi bandimak athi wuna.demala pasale uthsawawalata ha tharagawalata sinhala lamayi aawa giya wage ma sinhala pasale uthsawawalatath demala lamayi aa giyaha.pasal deke daruwan wage ma guruwarun athara da dadi samagiyak ha bandimak athi wune ya.pasal deka haraha mulu palathe ma sinhala demala sawoma jathi bedayakin thorawa dadi samagiyakin yuthu wa katayuthu kalaha.kolambain aatha daraniyagala pa‡∑äradeshaye asalwasi sinhala saha demala pasal dekak athara athi wu me samagi bamma pasugiya da mulu mahath lokaya idiriye agayimata lak kerini.ehi di me pasal deka jathyanthara sama sammanayakin ha dolar lakshayaka mudalin pidum labi ya.
